name: Traveler BurnerBox
description:
Need that small box to transport your smoking accessory's with you discreetly? Tired of using that crappy box you have been using since grade school? Well now is the time to upgrade to a BURNER BOX! This traveler will help you transport your pipes,grinders, Tobacco/ Herbs, and a lot of other items. It comes with a division that houses a odor proof jar that fits nice and snug in its slot. It also contains a custom made slot for a standard sized weight scale.
 
SCALE DOES NOT COME WITH BOX, ALTHOUGH GLASS ;DOES!

Length: 8.5 IN
Height:  4.5 IN

name: Dual Mason Stash Box (for the Heavyweights)
description:
Now this box rite here is for the heavy weights. This Box House's 2 Pint sized mason jars. It has one large compartment for a scale, or other items. It also has 2 other smaller compartments for your accessories. Our boxes are made nice and sturdy and are very secure.

BOX INCLUDES (2) PINT SIZED MASON JARS

name: Extended Burner
description: This particular style of box comes with 5 compartments to hold all of your smoking accessory's. It also contains 1 big compartment that comes with a 4 stack plastic container that fits nice and snug into that long hidden compartment.The items you see in the picture do no come with the box although the plastic container does. This model has a holder for 3 lighters also! All of our boxes come equipped with a latch for a pad lock so no need to worry about anyone getting inside of it without your magic key.
